thread.section_title: Porcelanosa opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Porcelanosa | www.porcelanosa.com
thread.title: Louis Verrico

author: Louis Verrico
title: Louis Verrico
text:
Kate at Purley has been fantastic from start to finish! I haven't received my tiles yet but the customer service has been impeccable.
She recommended me ideas where I was unsure on certain aspects and made the process really simple. I have even been a pain and kept changing my delivery date, but it was no pain for Kate.
Thank you so much I really appreciate your help!
